tipsMap.TIP_CHECK_LAST_MEAL: Check the last meal (time and amount).
tipsMap.TIP_SUCKING_SIGNS: Look for sucking cues (hand to mouth).
tipsMap.TIP_SLEEP_ROUTINE: Try rocking and a sleep routine.
tipsMap.TIP_SLEEP_SIGNS: Watch for signs: yawning and rubbing eyes.
tipsMap.TIP_CHECK_TEMP: Check the temperature (too hot or too cold).
tipsMap.TIP_GAS_MASSAGE: Gas or colic: gentle belly massage.
tipsMap.TIP_CREAM_IF_IRRITATION: Clean and apply cream if irritated.
tipsMap.TIP_MONITOR_FEVER: If crying is unusual or strong: monitor fever and seek advice if needed.
tipsMap.TIP_HOLD_SKIN: Hold the baby with skin-to-skin contact.
tipsMap.TIP_SOOTH_TALK: Speak softly and rock the baby.
